films.title: The Giant Gila Monster
films.description: A giant lizard terrorizes a rural Texas community and a heroic teenager attempts to destroy the creature.

films.title: Manos: The Hands Of Fate
films.description: A family gets lost on the road and stumbles upon a hidden, underground, devil-worshiping cult led by the fearsome Master and his servant Torgo.

films.title: Plan 9 from Outer Space
films.description: Aliens resurrect dead humans as zombies and vampires to stop humanity from creating a doomsday weapon.

films.title: Robot Monster
films.description: A cosmic monster terrorizes the last survivors of Earth.

films.title: Bride of the Monster
films.description: A scientist attempts to create a race of superhumans in his lab.

films.title: The Creeping Terror
films.description: A monster from space terrorizes a small town.

films.title: The Incredibly Strange Creatures Who Stopped Living and Became Mixed-Up Zombies
films.description: A carnival hypnotist turns his audience into zombies.

films.title: The Beast of Yucca Flats
films.description: A defecting Soviet scientist is transformed into a monster after a nuclear test.

films.title: Eegah
films.description: A prehistoric giant kidnaps a cave girl and brings her back to his lair.

films.title: Santa Claus Conquers the Martians
films.description: Martians kidnap Santa Claus to bring joy to their children.
